segments.text: Big time ! A hacker broke into the company's files and got all her personal information . You really think it's completely safe ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , maybe not 100 percent . I did hear about some tricks people use .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Now we're getting to the truth .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: There are shills . A shill is someone who bids up the price of their own sale .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: See ? And I bet that's easy to do online . Everybody's anonymous .
segments.speaker: S2
